title.narrative: Multitranche Financing Facility (MFF) - Uttarakhand State-Road Investment Program (Subproject 1)

description.narrative: The Project will help the State of Uttarakhand to: (i) improve a sub-network of roads, totaling about 570 km; (ii) initiate business process reengineering of PWD; and (iii) increase PWD staff's asset management skills.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: 1. Increased efficiency of inter- and intrastate transport services 2.Enhanced sustainability of roadnetwork in good condition 3.Increased operational transparency andgovernance of PWD 4. National roaddevelopment programs synergized

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
4.1.Share of roads in good condition connected to NHDP and PMGSY roads increased from 10% to 30% by 2010
